isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, CUMMINS M11E AND N14E - TROUBLESHOOTING - COMPULINK™

svcproc.title: COMPULINK™
svcproc.para: CELECT PLUS vehicles have a data link (refer to ATA Data Link Connector [313]) for the Compulink. The Compulink is used to program owner-specified information into the engine, monitor the system, and aid in troubleshooting the engine. Consult the Cummins CELECT PLUS Troubleshooting and Repair Manual. The Compulink may be available at the nearest Cummins Authorized Service Center.
Compulink must be used with a CELECT service cartridge to communicate with a CELECT engine. A PACE or PT PACER cartridge will not work properly.

note.para: On the Cummins Compulink™, since no alpha characters are available, use the up arrow and down arrow to move through the alphabet.
